name: Extractonaut
description:
A vertical 2D  platformer made with C++ and the SDL  library for a university assignment.  

Help Kersh return to his ship high above. Watch out for the Kershonite and crumbling platforms on the way up. 

WARNING: This is a challenging platformer!

Controls 

Action KeybindingsMove  left and right[A] & [D] or  [←] & [→]Jump[Space] or [↑]
